arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – Luis Enrique’s press conference live this Saturday
arts.sum: This Sunday at 5:15 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Lens (5th) at the Parc des Princes during the 4th day of Ligue 1 2025-2026. On the eve of this match, Parisian coach Luis Enrique will be in a press conference at 1 p.m. An event to follow live here (we will then publish […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Lens – Big news for Luis Enrique!
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, 55, Paris Saint-Germain coach, will be on the bench for the match against Lens this Sunday, reports RMC Sport. The Spaniard will lead the pre-match training session and has received messages of support from several PSG players, confirming the solidarity around him. “Spanish coach Luis Enrique, who underwent surgery on his collarbone after […]
